name: Lieutenant Rya Kirsch
Lore: 'Became a member of Bravo Flight after embarrassing himself in front of Amidala as a guard. Has redeemed himself by becoming an expert in defense aviation tactics.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. While aboard Bravo 4, draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise, and opponent''s droid starfighters are deploy +2 at same system.',
